thread.title: Bill Conway Joins American Well's Executive Team as General Manager of Provider Solutions

author: cnbc.com
title: Bill Conway Joins American Well's Executive Team as General Manager of Provider Solutions
text:
BOSTON, March 5, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- American Well, the national telehealth leader, announced today that Bill Conway will join its executive leadership team as general manager of provider solutions, reporting to Chairman and CEO Ido Schoenberg. Conway brings with him over 30 years of healthcare industry experience, with a specific focus on driving adoption of disruptive solutions.
"Bill has a strong track record of success," said Ido Schoenberg, Chairman and CEO of American Well. "He brings great leadership expertise in building large client facing organizations and a profound understanding of the provider space. We are thrilled to have him with us, as we look to power the telehealth infrastructure for America's healthcare business."
Prior to joining American Well, Conway served as senior vice president at athenahealth with responsibility for sales, account management, onboarding services, channel management and market strategy. In an earlier role as vice president of small group sales, he reimagined the sales approach to dramatically accelerate national adoption of athenahealth's software with independent physician groups.
Before this, Conway was regional vice president of sales for Allscripts Corporation and also spent 13 years at IDX Systems Corporation where he held a variety of roles.
"I'm inspired by American Well's mission to provide affordable, quality access to healthcare," said Bill Conway. "Our healthcare system is broken. We need to find innovative ways to connect patients with the care that they need and telehealth is an obvious component of the overall solution. I am thrilled to be joining the national telehealth leader to help drive adoption of this technology."
To meet Bill and learn more about how American Health Runs American Well, please stop by booth #1038 during HIMSS 2018. More information here: https://www.americanwell.com/himss-2018/ .
About American Well
American Well uses telehealth to improve people's access to quality care. Through our partnerships with the nation's largest health systems, insurers, employers, and retailers, our award-winning telehealth Exchange and our direct-to-consumer service, AmwellÂ®, we connect millions of Americans to the doctors they trust for live video visits. Through the power of telehealth, we help patients get the care they need in a timely fashion, and help doctors be there for their patients. We build technologies to make healthcare go where people need it most. For more on how we are changing healthcare delivery through telehealth, visit AmericanWell.com .
